thread.title: Even at 38, Vince Carter can still jump out of the building
thread.title_full: Even at 38, Vince Carter can still jump out of the building

title: Even at 38, Vince Carter can still jump out of the building
text:
Even at 38, Vince Carter can still jump out of the building FOX Sports 
Sep 30, 2015 at 9:43p ET + 
When Vince Carter soars through the air, he's (almost) literally flying. Justin Ford / AP Updated Sep 30, 2015 at 10:38p ET 
It might be time to start regularly referring to Memphis Grizzlies veteran Vince Carter by his "Half-Man, Half-Amazing" moniker once again, if this photo is any indication: true â€” P3 (@P3sportscience) September 30, 2015 
Carter was (apparently) recently at P3, a private conditioning and biometrics firm that includes many NBA players among its clients. With the Grizzlies back at training camp starting Tuesday, it's unlikely the picture is from this week. But we'll take P3's word that it's a picture of Carter at 38 years old. 
And when the picture is placed side-by-side with the much younger Andrew Wiggins , courtesy of Ball Is Life , Carter's leap becomes even more impressive: true
